DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics follow single oral multiple oral dos BMS-791325 healthy Japanese subject .
DOC.brief_title: Japanese Bridging Study Conducted United States
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject age 20 49 year , BMI 1830 kg/m2 First generation Japanese . Subject born Japan live outside Japan > 10 year , subject trace maternal paternal Japanese ancestry Any significant acute chronic medical illness . Women pregnant , breastfeeding , unwilling unable use acceptable method birth control . Gastrointestinal disease may impact absorption study drug require treatment protocon inhibitor , antacid H2 blocker . History eczema , psoriasis , intermittent active dermatitis . Positive HIV HCV
